thread.title: TERESITA

author: TERESITA
title: TERESITA
text: My husband and me discovered Car Rental 8 many years ago when nobody know about it. It was funny when the customers service of the different car rental companies that car rental 8 sub rent could not believe that we got a car rental less expensive than the company that they represented. We usually travel twice a year to Florida and in some times to California. There are no hidden fees, you get what you paid. We always compare with other Car Rentals and the prices of Car Rental 8 are often better.
